import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useCart } from '../context/CartContext'; import { useAuth } from '../context/AuthContext'; import { orderAPI } from '../services/api'; import './Payment.css'; const Payment = () => { const { cartItems, cartTotals, clearCart } = useCart(); const { user } = useAuth(); const [paymentMethod, setPaymentMethod] = useState('card'); const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ // Billing Info (pre-filled from user if available) fullName: user?.name || '', email: user?.email || '', phone: user?.phone || '', address: '', city: '', state: '', pincode: '', // Card Info cardNumber: '', expiryDate: '', cvv: '', cardName: '', // UPI Info upiId: '' }); const navigate = useNavigate(); // Use cartTotals from CartContext instead of calculating here const total = cartTotals.total || 0; const handleChange = (e) => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); try { // Prepare order data for each cart item (since we now store one product per order) const orders = []; for (const item of cartItems) { const orderData = { customer_name: formData.fullName, customer_email: formData.email, customer_phone: formData.phone, shipping_address: `${formData.address}, ${formData.city}, ${formData.state} - ${formData.pincode}`, product_name: item.id, // This is the database product name (e.g., '100_rupees_note') quantity: item.quantity || 1, unit_price: item.price, special_instructions: '', custom_photo_url: null // Add later if needed for frames }; // Create order via API const order = await orderAPI.create(orderData); orders.push(order); } // Clear cart and redirect clearCart(); alert(`Payment successful! ${orders.length} order(s) placed successfully.`); navigate('/'); } catch (error) { console.error('Order creation failed:', error); alert(`Order failed: ${error.message}`); } }; if (cartItems.length === 0) { return (

No Items to Checkout

Tax (GST 18%) â‚¹{cartTotals.gst}
Total â‚¹{total}
); }; export default Payment;
